#summary Advice on integrating with other tools.

= Running !JsDoc Toolkit from Eclipse =

_contributed by simon.speich_

You can run !JsDoc Toolkit from within Eclipse by setting up
Run → External Tools → Open External Tools Dialog...

Location
{{{
C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_12\bin\java.exe
}}}

Working Directory
{{{
C:\DirectoryToWhereJsDocToolkitIsLocated\jsdoc_toolkit
}}}

Arguments
{{{
-jar app/js.jar app/run.js -r=4 -t=templates/sunny "-d=C:\PathToWhereDocIsSaved" "C:\PathToWebsiteToDocument"
}}}

For more information about arguments see CmdlineOptions
